properties.name: ClientApplication
properties.short: Medplum client application for automated access.
properties.definition: Medplum client application for automated access.

properties.name: id
properties.definition: The logical id of the resource, as used in the URL for the resource. Once assigned, this value never changes.

properties.name: meta
properties.definition: The metadata about the resource. This is content that is maintained by the infrastructure. Changes to the content might not always be associated with version changes to the resource.

properties.name: implicitRules
properties.definition: A reference to a set of rules that were followed when the resource was constructed, and which must be understood when processing the content. Often, this is a reference to an implementation guide that defines the special rules along with other profiles etc.

properties.name: language
properties.definition: The base language in which the resource is written.

properties.name: name
properties.definition: A name associated with the ClientApplication.

properties.name: description
properties.definition: A summary, characterization or explanation of the ClientApplication.

properties.name: secret
properties.definition: Client secret string used to verify the identity of a client.

properties.name: jwksUri
properties.definition: Optional JWKS URI for public key verification of JWTs issued by the authorization server (client_secret_jwt).

properties.name: redirectUri
properties.definition: Optional redirect URI used when redirecting a client back to the client application.

properties.name: launchUri
properties.definition: Optional launch URI for SMART EHR launch sequence.

searchParameters.name: name
searchParameters.description: The name of the client application
